master

Class LineDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • master.LineDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LineDetector
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class will detect when a black line intersection is crossed. At each intersection it will send a message to the other NXT brick to poll the US to detect obstacles.
    Author:
    alex
